post.summary: Stateful compute rules of this product

get.summary: Get all finance values of the policy

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: customer id, the value can be "me" which represents the customer self

createdBy.description: Name or IP of the calling client or the interface initiating the request

updatedBy.description: Name or IP of the calling client or the interface initiating the request

code.description: A unique code of a product

version.description: Version no of same type of product

products.description: Mandatory Attributes - For /product/{id}/compute/availability - code, components[0].attributes.birthDate, components[0].attributes.ktpId, components[0].attributes.email

clientId.description: A unique no of a customer

type.description: Class of customer Individual or corporate

addressDetails.description: Address belonging to the customer used for policy related communication. Address is an object, identify by address type as key, comprising all relevant attributes of address.

code.description: A unique no which is assigned to use as a company representative

channel.description: Channel for which agent is working

licenceNo.description: Official number to work as agent

licenceExpDate.description: Data on which agent licence renewal due

appointmentDate.description: Date on which person hired as an agent

terminationDate.description: Date on which person release from company

BankAccount.description: List of bank a/c belonging to the customer used for policy related payment and receipts. Each bank account is an object, identify by account no as key, comprising all relevant attributes of bank account.

id.description: A unique identifier for Beneficiary records. It is made up of beneficiary number, country code and source system code.

startDate.description: Nomination start date for claim benefit

endDate.description: Nomination end date for claim benefit

basePremium.description: This is the total premium amount due minus taxes.

type.description: Class of customer Individual or corporate

bankAccounts.description: List of bank a/c belonging to the customer used for policy related payment and receipts. Each bank account is an object, identify by account no as key, comprising all relevant attributes of bank account.

id.description: A unique identifier for customer records. It is made up of client number, country code and source system code.

clientId.description: A unique no of a customer

type.description: Class of customer Individual or corporate

contactDetails.description: Contact detail belonging to the customer used for policy related communication. Contact detail is an object, it contains mobile, phone, internet etc as key and respective values.

addressDetails.description: Address belonging to the customer used for policy related communication. Address is an object, identify by address type as key, comprising all relevant attributes of address.

bankAccounts.description: List of bank a/c belonging to the customer used for policy related payment and receipts. Each bank account is an object, identify by account no as key, comprising all relevant attributes of bank account.

type.description: Type of premium loading, represents reason for extra loading of premium on a product option or product component option.

fromDate.description: Extra loading of premium effective date

toDate.description: Extra loading of premium end date

PremiumLoading.description: Extra loading of premium is captured

id.description: A unique identifier for coverage record. It is made up of coverage code and source system code.

code.description: The code of component Mandatory Attribute - For /proposal

premium.description: This is the total amount which is being against the contract made between insurer and insured

premiumCessTerm.description: Number of Years for which Premium needs to be Paid.

premiumCessDate.description: After this date, Customer doesnt have to pay any Premium, but still Coverage will be Active

riskCessDate.description: This is the date, on which Coverage will get expired, after which there is no legal contract remains active.

commencementDate.description: Date on which Coverage becomes active for the first time

riskCessTerm.description: Number of Years for which Customer is covered.

installmentPremium.description: This is installment amount, which is exclusive of Loading premium if any.

mortalityClass.description: This is the Rating Class assigned by Insurer, which decides the Risk on insured Life.

loadingPremium.description: This is Loading premium, which needs to be paid, if Insured comes under high risk category.

status.description: Status of the Coverage. Eg. Inforce, Lapsed, etc

ProductComponentOption.description: Reference to Rider Components which  are being taken along with Main coverage

id.description: A unique identifier for Main coverage records. It is made up of policy number, life no, coverage no,  country code and source system code.

totalPremium.description: This is the total amount which is being against the contract made between insurer and insured

totalSumAssured.description: This is the Amount, which will be paid in case any unfortunate event happens

paymentFrequency.description: This is the interval with which Customer has to pay the premium

commencementDate.description: Date on which Coverage becomes active for the first time

loadingPremium.description: This is Loading premium, which needs to be paid, if Insured comes under high risk category.

status.description: Status of the Coverage. Eg. Inforce, Lapsed, etc

premiumCessDate.description: After this date, Customer doesnt have to pay any Premium, but still Coverage will be Active

premiumCessTerm.description: Number of Years for which Premium needs to be Paid.

riskCessDate.description: This is the date, on which Coverage will get expired, after which there is no legal contract remains active.

riskCessTerm.description: Number of Years for which Customer is covered.

installmentPremium.description: This is installment amount, which is exclusive of Loading premium if any.

mortalityClass.description: This is the Rating Class assigned by Insurer, which decides the Risk on insured Life.

topUpFlag.description: Flag will denote the coverage type,if this is being taken as the topup on existing Coverage.

subStandardLife.description: This is the flag, which denotes if insured falls under risk Category or not

productComponentOptions.description: Reference to Rider Components which  are being taken along with Main coverage

extraLoadingDetail.description: Extra loading of premium is captured

surrenderValue.description: Actual amount paid out to customer upon surrender of a policy broken down for base plan and top-ups.

surrenderAdjustment.description: Any adjustment made over or below the calculated surrender value.

id.description: A unique identifier for coverage record. It is made up of coverage code and source system code.

code.description: The code of component Mandatory Attribute - For /proposal

employeeTerminateDate.description: employee terminate date for group policy

effectiveDate.description: Actual date from when change is effective
